column4: hi there; sorry to disturb..; I got a problem & Im here to find some help..

Im using ub10.04 . im trying to set the "Super_L" key to startup terminal ..using this command "gconftool-2 --set /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_terminal --type string "Super_L"" but didnot work ..someone can help me
if you use terminal a lot I can recommend installing guake
